Kiwis Hamish Day and Oscar Day arrested in Thailand, accused of attacking police officer and snatching gun https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwis-hamish-day-and-oscar-day-arrested-in-thailand-accused-of-attacking-local-police-officer-and-snatching-gun/ XYNVYQOSX5EZ7OJ4NZ2AN2BCS4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwis-hamish-day-and-oscar-day-arrested-in-thailand-accused-of-attacking-local-police-officer-and-snatching-gun/ XYNVYQOSX5EZ7OJ4NZ2AN2BCS4/ The pair allegedly attempted to bribe the officer after he arrested them. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:50:58 +0000 Two Kiwis are accused of attacking a local police officer after being pulled over in Thailand, taking his gun and causing a shot to go off. Photo / Thapapong Trs

Fewer Aucklanders heading to Northland to view real estate during Brynderwyns closure https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/fewer-aucklanders-heading-to-northland-to-view-real-estate-during-brynderwyns-closure/FB7RBUJKOZE3FKQ46R34VI23IM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/fewer-aucklanders-heading-to-northland-to-view-real-estate-during-brynderwyns-closure/FB7RBUJKOZE3FKQ46R34VI23IM/ Jenny LingBrynderwyns closure gives locals advantage: 'They don’t have to compete with Aucklanders'. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Ray White Bream Bay and Waipu real estate agent James Alexander said many Aucklanders won’t bother making the trip north as the detour routes through Waipu Cove and Paparoa-Oakleigh Rd will add more time to their journeys.
